schools.title: Cambridge ELLIS Unit Summer School on Probabilistic Machine Learning
schools.description: Five-day summer school on probabilistic ML, covering advanced probabilistic models, generative models, causality, and accelerating science, with lectures and panel discussions; school expected to take place July 2026 at University of Cambridge.

schools.title: Machine Learning for Molecules 2026
schools.description: Summer school on ML for molecular and materials science: property prediction, ML potentials, graph neural networks, self-driving labs, and generative/LLM-based synthesis prediction, with lectures, tutorials, and poster session; school expected to take place September 2026 at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT).
